entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 11:35 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:38 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:38 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 10:38 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
